description: MS pilot of Earth Federation`s Londo Bell team. Son from a family of politicians. He entered the army opposing his family wishes for him to be a politician. He wants to make a name on his own and became a pilot. Originally pilots the mass-produced RGZ-95 ReZEL, a successor to the RGZ-91 ReGZ(Refined Gundam Zeta), eventually becomes the second pilot of the RX-0 Gundam Unicorn Unit-2 "Banshee"
name: Riddhe Marcenas
